cancelReset._description: Cancel an autoreset for the currently logged-in account. Don't use with a temporary (web) session

_description: Tell the server to put an account into the reset pipeline.
If no password is provided, the user will need to click a confirmation link in an email or text.

showFinalResetScreen._description: Show the screen where the user chooses whether to actually reset their account or cancel out

startAccountReset._description: Start the account reset process in the GUI.
